comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Commander Quevedo captained the cuban gunboat CUBA, which was in New York for the opening of the Maine Monument, He was also a Lieutenant colonel in the Cuban Army. Here is the New York Times article of Friday May 30, 1913 which sets out in detail the program of commemmoration: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DEFDB143FE633A...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: captainslack and lifeasdaddy: Thanks for the additional information on the men in this photograph.  When we update the record, we will expand the descriptive details.
